alcohol.name: The Holy Trinity
alcohol.description: Go to a pub/bar and drink three pints/cocktails within an hour

alcohol.description: Attend a wine, beer or whisky tasting

alcohol.name: You'll be crawling too by the end
alcohol.description: Go on a pub or bar crawl with at least six locations

alcohol.description: Have a shot of at least five unique spirits in one night

alcohol.name: You might not be able to spell after this
alcohol.description: Have a drink for each letter in your name (Aperol spritz, Buck's fizz, etc.)

alcohol.name: And try not to drunk text your ex

alcohol.description: Visit a brewery or a distillery

alcohol.name: It probably won't
alcohol.description: Make a cocktail from Pinterest and see if it tastes as good as it looks

alcohol.name: If it's over £5.50 the glass is included
alcohol.description: Order a Guiness and 'split the G' first try

alcohol.description: Have a drink in a secret bar

alcohol.description: Play a game of ring of fire

alcohol.description: Play a round of pub/bar golf

alcohol.description: Win a game of beer pong

alcohol.description: Play drunk jenga (write forfeits on the blocks)

alcohol.description: Have a pint of beer in a beer garden

silly.name: Boomer scamming
silly.description: Get an item worth at least £20/$25 completely free from Facebook Marketplace

silly.name: You might regret this
silly.description: Sing your favourite song at a karaoke event

silly.name: old companions
silly.description: Send a letter or postcard to your parents inviting them to a party asking them to rsvp to a made up email adress. then sign it with some made up names to confuse them

silly.name: cheesed off
silly.description: Leave a single slice of cheese on someone’s car windshield. Take a selfie with it and leave before they notice.

silly.name: Overdressed much

silly.name: The ultimate prank
silly.description: Put googly eyes on everything in your fridge

silly.description: Walk past a random playground and loudly say, “Timmy, get down from there! That’s dangerous!” even though no child is named Timmy or related to you.

silly.description: Make a poster for tinder for dogs and put it up in your local park

silly.description: Hand someone doing their job (cashier, security, barista, etc.) an uno reverse card

silly.name: WHERE'S GREG??
silly.description: Ask three different strangers if they’ve seen “Greg.” Act increasingly panicked. Never explain who Greg is.

silly.name: argh
silly.description: Leave a voicemail to a friend or parent where you speak only in pirate language. End it with 'they’ve found me. I must go.'

silly.name: Water Sommelier
silly.description: Bring three different brands of bottled water to a party or hangout and insist on doing a formal tasting. Take it extremely seriously.
